## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5fa2b10f84e5b81ecdaf78fe9fa765da27b2d8946e98e58b4a1b25dfacd3c62f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'sarif' @ 0.1.3 (rubygems) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
